properties.name: experimentsFileUploadLocation
properties.description: The path for storing experiment files uploaded by the user.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.ram
properties.description: The default value for the RAM if nothing is set.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.cpu
properties.description: The default value for the CPU if nothing is set.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.bookedTime
properties.description: The default value for the booked time if nothing is set.

properties.name: mockdata
properties.description: Populates the database with demo data for development purposes.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret used for signing JWTs.

properties.name: mockKubernetesClient
properties.description: Set false if you want to use the KubernetesClient.

properties.name: kubernetes.defaultLogLines
properties.description: Default amount of lines returned when requesting the logs of an active execution without specifying the amount of lines explicitly.

properties.name: dockerRegistry.username
properties.description: The users name from which the image should be pulled from the docker registry.

properties.name: dockerRegistry.authKey
properties.description: The authentication key of the user.

properties.name: dockerHubRepoPath
properties.description: The repository name for the hafenkran docker-hub.

properties.name: kubernetes.debugging
properties.description: Set debugging to false in order to use the kubernetes pod informer. If debugging is set to true, kubernetes will throw an exception that it cannot use the pod informer.
